folder: Hamilton Avenue & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Hamilton Avenue (left), at the intersection of Hicks Street, showing Shaft 17-A, Tunnel No. 2, of the Board of Water Supply, City of New York.

View 1: June 6, 1931

P. L. Sperr

Views 1, 3 as south from Hicks Street. The building will soon be razed for the construction of the Giovanna Parkway.

view 2: Neg. No. A-1024
view 3: Neg. No. A-1025

text:
Hicks Street, adj. the n.e. cor. Hamilton Avenue, Brooklyn.
